quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It feels like I’m constantly having to fight just to get the basics logged.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I do keep raising that point with them.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But it shouldn’t need me to push like this. That’s what you’re supposed to do as my advocate.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, and I am, but the system is very slow.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Slow isn’t an excuse when it’s my safety on the line.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand, and I’ll continue pressing them.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights advocate role vs. advocate deflects responsibility onto 'slow system'

timeline_hooks.link: Ongoing failure to log case details
